description_home: Frontend developer with two years of experience developing applications on my own and one year working as a Freelance developer for a Startup in Colorado. I am ready to help with my knowledge to create functional, components reusables and scalable applications in the future.
description_about: I am always willing to learn new technologies, best practices and teamwork.  I have more than 1 and a half years of experience as a Freelance for a Colorado startup. I am not an official employee, so I cannot attend team and business meetings (which is why I want to change, to be able to grow professionally with a team and not only technically).
text_skills: I have worked with these technologies
tools_skills: These are the tools I use for task control and team communication
text_projects: These are some of my recent projects
github_project: I have more repositories on my Github.
contact_description: If you'd like me to be part of your team, don't hesitate to contact me. I’d be delighted to discuss how I can contribute to your projects!
contact_email: You can also send me an email at:
description_exp_neurocann: Neurocann is a cannabis ERP app that manages production and fulfillment data in one system for your customers to see in a general view.
task_three_neurocann: Code refactoring to build a more scalable application in the future.
task_four_neurocann: Build a more confident test suite with CypressJS, React Testing Library, Jest and MSW.
task_five_neurocann: Creation of reusable React components in a shared library to use across different applicationst.
task_six_neurocann: Intensive handling of forms with react-hook-form and Formik
task_seven_neurocann: Management and virtualization of tables with react-table and react-virtual.
description_exp_nerd: Nerd is an advertising agency that develops digital marketing strategies and technological creativity solutions for large companies.
task_one_nerd: I am responsible for making changes to the staging environment of La Anónima's website. This involves making design changes, creating new landing pages, updating site content, adding functionalities, accessing the database to make changes, submitting them to the client for approval, and, if approved, deploying everything to the production environment.
task_two_nerd: Design and development of responsive interfaces using PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, Sass, HTML, and CSS to ensure an optimal user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
task_three_nerd: Creation of animated Google Ads banners in various sizes using Google Web Designer, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a U.S.-based advertising agency called FCB.
task_four_nerd: Markup of responsive email templates for different email clients using HTML, ensuring proper display across a variety of email clients by testing with Email On Acid.
description_exp_gunny: Gunny es un juego shooter en tercera persona F2P libre de especulaciones financieras que realiza transacciones en la red de Algorand.
task_one_gunny: Diseño y maquetación con React JS, Chakra UI y Sass, de un sitio web para un proyecto blockchain con red de Algorand.
task_two_gunny: Uso y creación de imágenes realizadas con la ayuda de IA Midjourney.
task_three_gunny: Conexión de contratos de red blockchain al frontend con React JS.
